title: 【CDTV】10月1日 北京的庆祝VS香港的抗议
content:
10月1日，北京举行了大型的国庆阅兵与庆祝活动，而同一天，香港爆发了大规模的游行（主题：“没有国庆只有国殇”）以及更激烈的抗议行动，有示威者遭到实弹射击。纽约时报将同日两地的新闻片段画面剪辑并同框，向读者展现了“一国两制”下的一日魔幻中国。

Celebrations in Beijing, Violence in Hong Kong: 2 Very Different Scenes

By NOOR GILL | Oct. 1, 2019 | 1:11

One of the largest parades in modern Chinese history took place in Beijing to celebrate National Day. At the same time, violent protests broke out in the streets of Hong Kong in a challenge to China’s rule. Here’s what these dueling events looked like.

While Beijing celebrated the 70th anniversary of Communist rule on Tuesday, some of the worst violence yet in Hong Kong's protests against China's influence was breaking out in the streets.
